mdRecord.dcterms:title: In the Roanoke County Courthouse in Salem, Va., the Roanoke County Board of Supervisors discusses a proposal to hold public meetings to inform the public about consolidating Roanoke County, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Roanoke County Board of Supervisors meets to discuss its agenda in the Roanoke County Courthouse in Salem, Va. Footage shows Chairman Lee B. Eddy, Vice Chairman Charles H. Osterhoudt, Joseph C. Thomas, A. T. Huddleston, and L. Earl Simms seated at a table. Executive Officer Paul B. Matthews is also present. The board resolves to hold public meetings in various communities of Roanoke County, Va., at which time citizens may be informed of any plans regarding consolidating Roanoke County.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: County government
Annexation (County government)
